a222f5f6-0a64-431c-a55e-dcd32f0fe716.description: Earners of the BITC Job Coach credential have attended Business in the Community’s half-day training. Volunteers are trained to effectively use coaching tools to support clients with barriers to employment. The Coaching tools taught are, Active Listening, GROW Model, giving Feedback and Rapport Building. Also covered is safeguarding, awareness of client barriers, the Skills Builder Framework, and the Energy Curve.

alignments.name: Skills Builder Universal Framework
alignments.description: The Skills Builder Universal Framework has been designed to help build essential skills at all stages of life. The Skills Builder Universal Framework lists the eight essential skills: Listening, Speaking, Problem Solving, Creativity, Staying Positive, Aiming High, Leadership, Teamwork

badge_template_activities.title: To participate a coach will be an employee from a BITC member business that is dedicated to responsible business.
Each coach will have an interest in learning from individuals currently not in employment and a desire to develop and practice coaching skills
Each coach completes BITC’s half day training session to enhance their coaching journey
